"Innovative stapler design: A modular stapler that can be customized to fit different types of paper sizes and stapling needs."
"Smart stapler: A stapler with built-in AI technology that can suggest optimal stapling settings based on the type of paper being used."
"Sustainable stapler: A stapler made from eco-friendly materials such as bamboo or recycled plastic."
"Collapsible stapler: A stapler that can be collapsed into a compact size when not in use."
"Handheld stapler: A stapler designed specifically for handheld devices such as tablets and smartphones."
